name: Rupert's Nightmare
description:
Another attempt at making a bad but fun game. I did it different. Still pretty much the same bad camera. But different things to avoid and new object to find to win the game. This is a bad attempt at a horror game. This time I used some paid assets. Still nothing amazing.

You do not need to play Rupert's Journey to play this. There is no story for either of them.

Again this is just a silly game I am making awful on purpose, so if you like that sort of things play it and give it a try. But if not. Just move on.

This game isn't for everyone. Just remember to have fun.
